translations: 无污点的；未亵渎的，未受侵犯的

sentences.sentence: We believed our love was inviolate.
sentences.translation: 我们相信我们的爱是不受亵渎的。

sentences.sentence: Perfect in every detail, it would stand inviolate for thousands of years.
sentences.translation: 每一个细节都是如此的完美，它能完美无瑕的屹立数千年。

sentences.sentence: You stormed into an embassy; you violated the only absolutely inviolate rule of international relationships. And why?
sentences.translation: 你冲进一个大使馆，你违反了唯一绝对不能违反的国际关系准则，为什么？
